formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
A configuration in the Lab Manager library.
Create resources?
Network deployment option for VMs.
The name to use for the newly checked out configuration. If blank a name will be automatically created.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same results area.
Name or ID of the physical network to be used.
Set the state of the configuration to public or private.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The organization within Lab Manager.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The ElectricCommander location to get properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
Tag to get the deployed configuration.
Name of the saved configuration. If blank the configuration won't be saved.
Username of the new owner of the saved configuration. If blank the owner is not changed.
A configuration in the Lab Manager library.
New library name for the captured configuration. If blank the configuration won't be captured to the library.
The ElectricCommander location to store resulting configuration properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for the capture operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

Change the owner of the given configuration

procedure.description: Provision a configuration using LabManager 4.0 API

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
A configuration in the Lab Manager library.
Create resources?
Network deployment option for VMs.
The name to use for the newly checked out configuration. If blank a name will be automatically created.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same results area.
Name or ID of the physical network to be used.
Set the state of the configuration to public or private.
List of VMs to deploy. VM names must be separated by semicolons (;). Blank means that all VMs will be deployed.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Provision a configuration using LabManager 4.0 API

procedure.description: Create a configuration and add a VM based on a VM template

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
Name of the new configuration.
Description of the new configuration.
List of VM templates to add to the configuration. Template names must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of names of the VMs added to the configuration. VM names must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of boot sequence order values for the VMs. Values must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of boot delay values for the VMs. Values must be separated by semicolons (;).
Create resources?
Network deployment option for VMs.
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resources should use.
Name or ID of the physical network to be used.
Set the state of the configuration to public or private.
The ElectricCommander location to store resulting configuration properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create a configuration and add a VM based on a VM template

procedure.description: Create a configuration and add a VM based on a VM template (for LM 4.0)

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
Name of the new configuration.
Description of the new configuration.
List of VM templates to add to the configuration. Template names must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of names of the VMs added to the configuration. VM names must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of boot sequence order values for the VMs. Values must be separated by semicolons (;).
List of boot delay values for the VMs. Values must be separated by semicolons (;).
Fence policy enum for the configuration: NotSpecified for either fenced or unfenced. True for fenced only. False for unfenced only.
Deployment lease in milliseconds. Pass 0 for Never Expires. Max allowed value is one year.
Storage lease in milliseconds. Pass 0 for Never Expires. Max allowed value is one year.
Create resources?
Network deployment option for VMs.
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resources should use.
Name or ID of the physical network to be used.
Set the state of the configuration to public or private.
List of VMs to deploy. VM names must be separated by semicolons (;). Blank means that all VMs will be deployed.
The ElectricCommander location to store resulting configuration properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create a configuration and add a VM based on a VM template (for LM 4.0)

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The name of the configuration to deploy.
Network deployment option for VMs.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
Name or ID of the physical network to be used.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

procedure.description: Create resources from the virtual machines of a configuration

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The name of the configuration containing the virtual machines to create the resources from.
The Lab Manager Organization.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.
List of VMs to create resources from. VM names must be separated by semicolons (;). Blank means that resources will be created for all the VMs.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Create resources from the virtual machines of a configuration

The organization within Lab Manager.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The name of the configuration to be cloned.
The name of the new configuration.
Username of the new owner of the created configuration. If blank the owner is not changed.
The ElectricCommander location to store resulting configuration properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).
The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
Clone a configuration

formalParameter.description: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for LabManager.
The organization within Lab Manager.
The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer).
The number of days old. If blank all configurations for the given user will be cleaned up.
Delete configurations. If not checked, just undeploy; otherwise undeploy and delete.
Name pattern. If specified, only configurations matching the pattern will be cleaned up. If blank all configurations will be cleaned up.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.

step.description: Set the timelimit for the next step
